original_text: And his master said to him, “We will not turn aside into the city of foreigners, who do not belong to the people of Israel, but we will pass on to Gibeah.”
korean_text: 주인이 그에게 이르되 우리가 돌이켜 이스라엘 자손에게 속하지 아니한 이방 사람의 성읍으로 들어갈 것이 아니니 기브아로 나아가리라 하고

sentences.original_text: And his master said to him,
We will not turn aside into the city of foreigners,
who do not belong to the people of Israel,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 이스라엘 백성에 속하지 않는 자들이니,

sentences.original_text: but we will pass on to Gibeah.
